props.name: children
props.docblock: Specifies an additional class for the base element

description.text: Specifies an additional class for the base element

props.name: enterDuration
props.docblock: Duration of the element appearance transition.

description.text: Duration of the element appearance transition.

props.name: exitDuration
props.docblock: Duration of the element dismiss transition.

description.text: Duration of the element dismiss transition.

props.name: className
props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

description.text: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

props.name: onChildEnter
props.docblock: A `Transition` callback fired immediately after the `enter` or `appear` class is applied.

description.text: A `Transition` callback fired immediately after the `enter` or `appear` class is applied.

props.name: onChildEntering
props.docblock: A `Transition` callback fired immediately after the `enter-active` or `appear-active` class is applied.

description.text: A `Transition` callback fired immediately after the `enter-active` or `appear-active` class is applied.

props.name: onChildEntered
props.docblock:
A `Transition` callback fired immediately after the `enter` or
`appear` classes are removed and the done class is added to the DOM node.

description.text:
A `Transition` callback fired immediately after the `enter` or
`appear` classes are removed and the done class is added to the DOM node.

props.name: onChildExit
props.docblock: A `Transition` callback fired immediately after the `exit` class is applied.

description.text: A `Transition` callback fired immediately after the `exit` class is applied.

props.name: onChildExiting
props.docblock: A `Transition` callback fired immediately after the `exit-active` is applied.

description.text: A `Transition` callback fired immediately after the `exit-active` is applied.

props.name: onChildExited
props.docblock:
A `Transition` callback fired immediately after the `exit` classes
are removed and the exit-done class is added to the DOM node.

description.text:
A `Transition` callback fired immediately after the `exit` classes
are removed and the exit-done class is added to the DOM node.

props.name: transitionStyles
props.docblock: An object that specifies transition styles.

description.text: An object that specifies transition styles.

props.name: transitionClassNames
props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the `Transition`.

description.text: Specifies class name to append to the `Transition`.
